verbs.description: North Korea [V: will] never completely give up its nuclear weapons , a top defector said ahead of leader Kim Jong Un 's landmark summit with US President Donald Trump next month .

[ARG0: North Korea] [ARGM-MOD: will] [ARGM-NEG: never] [ARGM-EXT: completely] [V: give] up [ARG1: its nuclear weapons] , a top defector said ahead of leader Kim Jong Un 's landmark summit with US President Donald Trump next month .

[ARG1: North Korea will never completely give up its nuclear weapons] , [ARG0: a top defector] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: ahead of leader Kim Jong Un 's landmark summit with US President Donald Trump next month] .
